title: It’s Time For Civil Disobedience (Ep 1581)
description:
This isn’t “science” this is tyranny. In this episode, I discuss the mounting evidence that the government’s covid mandates are all about power. I also address the outrageous attack on Rand Paul by big tech. 

News Picks:


The most informative article I’ve read about mask mandates for children.

Our heroes in the military are being forced to take the vaccine. 


Ron DeSantis strikes again.

The broken teachers’ unions mask demands have them in dilemma. 

Biden’s corporate tax hike is going to slam middle-class Americans.
